metadata.title: Friday, 15th April, 2016
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    when the construction of the Masaiti District Administration offices will commence;
(b)    who the contractor for the project is;
(c)    what the cost of the project is; and
(d)    what the time-frame for undertaking the project is.
(a)    whether there are resident Judges in all towns where the High Court sits;
(b)    If not, which towns have no resident Judges; and

(c)    when resident Judges will be deployed to the affected towns to ensure speedy dispensation of justice. NOTICE OF MOTION Mr Muchima Report of the Committee on Youth and Sport: That this House do adopt the Report of the Committee on Youth and Sport for the Fifth Session of the Eleventh National Assembly, laid on the Table of the House on 6th April, 2016. ______________________
